Uses of Interface
eu.toolchain.concurrent.Stage

    • Uses of Stage in eu.toolchain.concurrent

      Subinterfaces of Stage in eu.toolchain.concurrent 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Completable<T>
      A value that can be completed at a later point in time.
      Classes in eu.toolchain.concurrent that implement Stage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractImmediate<T> 
      class  ConcurrentCompletable<T>
      A thread-safe implementation of Completable.
      class  ImmediateCancelled<T>
      A stage which has already been cancelled.
      class  ImmediateCompleted<T>
      A stage which has already been completed.
      class  ImmediateFailed<T>
      A stage which has already failed.
